excerpt.rendered: We emphasize on providing a congenial environment that fosters excellence! Infrastructure of the school plays a significant role in shaping students’ personality and holistic learning process. At India International School (IIS), we provide a comfortable and protected ambience to our students which help in creating a favorable environment. The widespread 30 acres campus is designed […]
